resources.string: Do you want to open Pebble App Store to install Pebble Dialer to your Pebble?
Opening Pebble app failed. Do you have Pebble app installed?
You appear to be running Android 5.0. Answer and decline functions are not supported by default, but you can gain them using root or using notification answer feature. Use help option for more info.
Unable to open settings page. Please find it in Settings app and open it manually.
Failed to send SMS. Please try again.
Some features (such as call answering) may not be working
Tap this card to fix it

Before you start scrolling through your contact list, you will be put into filtering mode first. Filtering allows you to quickly find wanted contact without long scrolling. \n\nWhen in filtering mode, simply press buttons corresponding to the letters:
To filter for \'Michael\' for example, you would press SELECT, SELECT, UP, SELECT, UP, UP, SELECT.
When you are finished with filtering hold down SELECT button to switch into scrolling mode.
When scrolling through call history, you can call the number back by pressing SELECT button or access all numbers of this contact by holding SELECT button
Disable \'Phone Calls\' in Pebble Time app
In order to not get duplicate call notifications, you must disable native call notifications.\n\nIn Pebble Time app, slide over to notifications tab (bell icon) and uncheck \'Phone Calls\'.
Tap on this card to open Tertiary Text manual.
Tap on this card to open full manual, including list of other Frequently Asked Questions.
Enable Dialer for Pebble on the list
Could not open the webpage. Do you have any web browser installed?
